item.title: Getting started with SRE - implementing SLAs, SLIs, and SLOs
item.description: Shobhit, Prashant and I wrote this document for observability whitepaper written by CNCFâ€™s tag-observability group. Purpose Implementing these SRE metrics lets you measure service quality and customer happiness objectively. More so over, it provides a common set of terminologies between different functions like business, product and engineering within an org. Engineering time is a scarce resource within any organisation but everyone feels like their problem is a burning problem. But SRE metrics make such conversations more data driven.
